Headline: #55 Garfield Temporary Westbound Reroute near 55th/Blackstone
ShortDescription: Westbound 55 Garfield buses are temporarily rerouted via 55th, Lake Park, 51st, Woodlawn and 55th: due to, police activity near 55th/Blackstone.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #55 Garfield buses are temporarily rerouted via 55th, Lake Park, 51st, Woodlawn and 55th: due to, police activity near 55th/Blackstone.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
